channel.title: Need help changing the xp rate for attack, strength and defence
channel.description: hi, to gain attack u need to attack the dummys, for strength the door nd defence the hay, but it takes to long to gain xp, how do i make the xp more?? please help, many thanks *poppyjem*[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 11:52:06 AM[/size][hr]can any 1 please help me????[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 12:27:57 PM[/size][hr]any 1?? some one most no or atleast tell me a tut i could find about it??

item.title: Need help changing the xp rate for attack, strength and defence
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

For pimpscape search

 case 1531:

Then change this ## to whatever you want your xp to be…

addSkillXP((##*playerLevel[1]), 1);

This is for defence, search around that area and you will find the attack and strenght.

Read full topic
